query.title: Query
query.prefill: What is the total number of likes and comments for the latest 10 posts on the @openai Instagram account? What are their two most popular posts?

model.title: OpenAI model
model.description: The OpenAI model to use. Currently supported models are gpt-4o and gpt-4o-mini, and the reasoning models o1 and o3-mini.

openai_api_key.title: OpenAI API Key
openai_api_key.description: The API key for the OpenAI API.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: If enabled, the Actor will run in debug mode and produce more output.
